## Source: ossf-package-analysis (050fca6c5c4fb3de1f734ee75e4a0e7471720a8c3b84ab4b47ebf64c9b803601)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@freshworksinc/platform-application' @ 1.4.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
